summary: TAKATA RECALL THIS RECALL HAS NOW BEEN OPEN FOR THREE YEARS AND FOUR MONTHS WITH NO PROPOSED RESOLUTION.  AS A FLORIDA RESIDENT OWNER OF AN AFFECTED VEHICLE, I CAN ONLY ASSUME THAT THE CONDITION WORSENS OVER TIME, AND THAT THE PASSENGER AIRBAG AT SOME POINT (SOON OR PRESENTLY) BECOMES A GREATER RISK OF DEGREDATION AND EXOLOSIVE DEPLOYMENT THAN OF PASSENGER PROTECTION.  MAY WE AT LEAST INSTUCT THE DEALER TO DISABLE THE AIRBAG TEMPORARILY (WITHOUT COST TO US) UNTIL A "FIX" IS AVAILABLE?
